String.string: Defeat Striktryssir in Saleron's Sky Garden and overcome Saleron's trial. [You must select Saleron's Sky Garden (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:237#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring the dragon's soul stone to Prophet Torsten and receive the relic fragment.
The relic fragment's power is yours!
Go back to the Ebon Span and speak with Saleron.
